name: Enter The Kidgeon
description:
Enter the kidgeon is all about child cruelty, exploring dungeons and being smart and lucky. Try to beat the dungeon, its traps, mysteries and monsters with 4 poor children. Good luck.

Enter the kidgeon is all about child cruelty, exploring dungeons and being smart and lucky. Try to beat the dungeon, its traps, mysteries and monsters with 4 poor children. Find items and cards and build the decks of your characters to fight off your assailants. Good luck.
